t = int(input())
while t != 0:
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    x = l[0]
    y = l[1]
    k = l[2]
    n = l[3]
    z = abs(x - y)
    if z % (2 * k) == 0:
        print('Yes')
    else:
        print('No')
    t = t - 1

n_cases = int(input())
for _ in range(n_cases):
    (x, y, k, n) = (int(x) for x in input().split())
    print('Yes' if abs(x - y) % (2 * k) == 0 else 'No')

for _ in range(n_cases):
    (x, y, k, n) = (int(x) for x in input().split())
    print('Yes' if abs(x - y) % (2 * k) == 0 else 'No')

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    xykn = input().split()
    x = int(xykn[0])
    y = int(xykn[1])
